tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: MW commence development of English as an Additional Language (EAL) field trial programme with remote language learning partner.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
content: MSE trial results show Phonomena training 'PhAB' average age-equivalent increases of 2.4 years after just 4 weeks training.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: When re-tested 6 weeks after training, a further 0.6 years increase. This shows

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font b span
content: Phonomena develops the learner's own resources

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: (trains the senses) so that improvement continues after the training has been completed, not only in the listening skills that have been practised, but also in standard tests of hearing and speech.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Phonomena first set of field trial results from SLTs announced in MindWeavers' Press Release.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Preliminary trial results show dramatic improvements in measures of reading abilities

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Identify & recruit mainstream school for field trials

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
content: MW engage with education sector to design mainstream school field trial program for 8-9 year-old children of normal abilities.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Using industry recognised performance measures of receptive language - the NFER Nelson 'Phonics Assessment Battery' (PhAB) test.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
content: Flagship Speech and Language Therapists trials show age equivalent improvement of 1.8 years in word listening ability.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: In a smaller trial in Special Schools, an age improvement of 1.2 years was found. These improvements are dramatic, and compare more than favourably with other commercial trials of language training software designed for perceptual learning. They prove the effectiveness of Phonomena Training in building listening skills that are essential for normal language.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Trial groups are: Speech Language Therapists, Special Schools, Mainstream Schools, English as a Second Language Schools, and Parents.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
content: MindWeavers recruit a panel of Speech & Language therapists.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: To assist with a major field trial of a newly developed computer game for children with language difficulties.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
content: International meeting of the Society for Neuroscience.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Attended by many of the top neuroscientists from across the world, showed the positive influence of auditory training on brain activity. A number of presentations highlighted the amazing ability of the brain to adapt to changed circumstances and to respond to the demands of a task, even in the elderly. These results strongly endorse the MindWeavers approach of using intensive training near the 'edge of competence'.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
content: MindWeavers develop new prototype computer game 'Phonomena'.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Incorporating adaptive phoneme discrimination software, Phonomena is targeted at 7 - 12 year old children with language difficulties although it has been shown to be effective in older age groups as well. The game has the highly motivating look and feel of a modern, mainstream computer video game.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
content: MindWeavers complete extensive market research programme.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: Across several sectors, including the speech & language profession and UK special needs education. Conclusions from this research will be used to direct the next phase of product development.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: A large market research initiative has been launched (with a newly recruited team) to understand fully the needs in the various sectors of the market and to provide focus to MindWeavers product research and development.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: MindWeavers have formed a partnership with Rebellion Developments, a leading computer games developer, to design and develop a new language skills improvement game. The new game will be aimed at 7 to 12 year old children with language development problems and will offer, for the first time in an educational game of this type, the look and feel of a mainstream computer game.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div font span
content: MindWeavers have launched an extensive programme of testing to research the effect of its phoneme discrimination game (Fisher Cat Olympics) on children of mixed abilities. Researchers will be running trials of the game in both mainstream and special needs schools.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
content: MindWeavers website nominated for IVCA Biz-Net awards

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: MindWeavers are amongst the five nominees in the Innovation category of the inaugural International Video Communication Association Biz-Net Awards. The awards are being presented at the Royal Society for the Arts.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
content: MindWeavers student wins the South-East STEP final

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: MindWeavers summer student Edith Oakley beat formidable competition to become 'the most enterprising student in the South East' in the Shell sponsored 'Technology Enterprise Programme'. This followed Edith's win at the regional level last month as a result of her work testing MindWeavers prototype software on schoolchildren. (Oxford Mail 14.09.00)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
content: MindWeavers offers prizes to play their on-line game

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: MindWeavers will be offering prizes to the top four players of their Fisher Cat Olympics game, available free on their website; mindweavers.co.uk. Players will also be able to follow their progress and this will add to research findings into the treatment of children with language problems.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: MindWeavers have commissioned Anglia Multimedia Ltd., a division of United News and Media, to produce their first website and prototype language training game. Anglia are leaders in both the multimedia and educational software fields.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: MindWeavers Ltd. have announced their incorporation. Advised by Garretts and Arthur Andersen, MindWeavers' mission is to develop and distribute sensory and motor training products based on cutting edge neuroscience research.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: MindWeavers, an Oxford University spin-out company, have announced that they have closed their first round investment following commitment from a range of institutional and private investors. The company now has sufficient funds to carry it through the first stages of development.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p b font span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font b span
html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: The DTI today named MindWeavers as a winner of a 'Smart Award for Innovation Excellence'.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td div div div div div div div p font span
content: "We're delighted by this recognition of the work done by our team." commented MindWeavers founder and CTO, Dr David Moore, adding that the award would greatly benefit the development of MindWeavers' first product, a computer game designed to help language development in children.
